name.name: Diffusion MRI Orientation Distribution Function in Constant Solid Angle (CSA-ODF) and Hough-Transform Tractography

software.description:
This is a diffusion-weighted MRI processing Matlab toolbox (including binaries), which can be used to:
•Compute the Q-Ball Imaging Orientation Distribution Function in Constant Solid Angle (CSA-ODF) for Diffusion-Weighted MRI, introduced in (Aganj et al, MRM 2010).
•Perform Hough-transform tractography, as described in (Aganj et al, MedIA 2011).
•Visualize the ODFs and tracts, and export them for further analysis.
•Verify the correctness of the diffusion gradient table, following (Aganj, Sci Rep 2018).

For short tutorials, see EXAMPLE.m and EXAMPLE_CLI.m. If available, GPUs can be used for speed-up.
